description: Vienna Secession exhibition catalogue with orange paper cover with embossed title; woodcut illustrations in Art Nouveau style of various subjects (landscapes, figures, etc.) and initials/monograms in orange and black; text in black

title: XIV.  Ausstellung der Vereinigung bildender Künstler Österreichs Secession Wien:  Klinger, Beethoven:  April-Juni 1902
